title: Ticket #1729: soap_job_tests-1 does not wait for schedd to update collector
description:
See ticket #1728 for more details. On brief inspection, this appears to be the same problem (not waiting between the start of the test and the condition checks long enough for the collector to update), this time with the command 'condor_status -schedd -l' being the trigger. See

http://nmi-s004.cs.wisc.edu/rundir/nmi-devel/2010/10/nmi-devel_nmi-s004.cs.wisc.edu_1287584045_20324/userdir/nmi:x86_deb_5.0/soap_job_tests-1.out

for the not-terribly-useful output.
remarks:
2011-Jan-27 14:50:47 by danb:
Bulk change of target version from v070505 to v070506 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Feb-01 16:20:02 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.
creator: tlmiller
